item.title: 中国半导体国家基金向存储芯片公司投资20亿美元
item.description:
China's state-backed chip investment fund has invested 14.56 billion yuan ($1.99 billion) in a memory chip company called Changxin Xinqiao, records showed.翻译:记录显示，中国国家支持的芯片投资基金已向一家名为长鑫新桥的存储芯片公司投资了 145.6 亿元人民币（19.9 亿美元）。

The deal saw China Integrated Circuit Industry Investment Fund, also known as the "Big Fund", contribute to 33.15% of the total registered capital of Changxin Xinqiao, according to an update dated Oct. 26 to the company's registration information on the National Enterprise Credit Information Publicity System.翻译:据长鑫新桥10月26日更新的国家企业信用登记信息显示，本次交易中，中国集成电路产业投资基金（又称“大基金”）出资占长鑫新桥注册资本总额的33.15%信息公示系统。

According to company registration website Qichacha, Changxin Xinqiao was founded in 2021 in Hefei city, in the eastern Anhui province.翻译:据公司注册网站企查查显示，长兴新桥于2021年在安徽省东部合肥市成立。

Its general manager is Zhao Lun, who is also the chairman and general manager of Changxin Memory Technology, which is one of China's leading memory chip companies.翻译:其总经理是赵伦，他也是中国领先的存储芯片公司之一长鑫存储科技的董事长兼总经理。

Changxin Xinqiao and the Big Fund did not immediately respond to Reuters' requests for comment.翻译:长鑫新桥和大基金没有立即回应路透社的置评请求。

The Big Fund's latest investment comes after it invested 13 billion yuan into Yangtze Memory Technologies (YMTC) earlier this year, marking one of its largest investments in recent years.翻译:大基金的最新投资是在今年早些时候向长江存储科技公司（YMTC）投资130亿元人民币之后进行的，这是该基金近年来最大的投资之一。

YMTC, China's only player in the global NAND memory market, has been aggressively expanding production capacity and R&D with the help of state subsidies. YMTC was blacklisted by the United States in 2022 over fears that it could divert U.S. technology to Huawei Technologies Co Ltd (HWT.UL)翻译:长江存储是全球NAND存储器市场上中国唯一的参与者，在国家补贴的帮助下，一直在积极扩大产能和研发。长江存储于 2022 年被美国列入黑名单，原因是担心其可能将美国技术转移到华为技术有限公司 (HWT.UL)

Changxin Xinqiao's capital raising from the Big Fund is part of a larger registered capital expansion that involved existing investors, Changxin Xinan and Hefei Xinyi, increasing their capital contribution by 10.4 billion yuan and 14 billion yuan respectively.翻译:长兴新桥此次向大基金募资是更大规模注册资本扩张的一部分，现有投资者长兴新安和合肥信亿分别增加了出资104亿元和140亿元。

Hefei Xinyi is backed by a couple of investment platforms linked to the state asset regulator in Anhui province, according to entries in the National Enterprise Credit Information Publicity System.翻译:根据国家企业信用信息公示系统的记录，合肥信义得到了几个与安徽省国有资产监管机构相关的投资平台的支持。

China launched the Big Fund in 2014 as a means to accelerate its semiconductor industry, which is considered to lag behind that of the United States, Taiwan and South Korea. The organization raised 138.7 billion yuan for its first fund, and 204 billion yuan for its second fund.翻译:中国于2014年推出大基金，作为加速其半导体产业发展的手段，该产业被认为落后于美国、台湾和韩国。该组织第一期基金募集资金1387亿元人民币，第二期基金募集资金2040亿元人民币。

Reuters reported last month that the Big Fund aims to raise about $40 billion in another round, as China ramps up efforts to catch up with rivals.翻译:路透社上个月报道称，随着中国加大力度追赶竞争对手，大基金计划在另一轮融资中筹集约 400 亿美元。

The fund has however also been embroiled in a corruption scandal that led to a probe into its former head last year.翻译:然而，该基金也卷入了腐败丑闻，导致去年对其前任负责人进行了调查。

($1 = 7.3162 Chinese yuan renminbi)翻译:（1 美元 = 7.3162 人民币）

Reporting by Yelin Mo, Roxanne Liu in Beijing and Brenda Goh in Shanghai; Editing by Simon Cameron-Moore翻译:Yelin Mo、Roxanne Liu 北京和 Brenda Goh 上海报道；西蒙·卡梅伦-摩尔 编辑

item.title: 泰国免除台湾和印度签证以促进旅游业
item.description:
Thailand will waive visa requirements for arrivals from India and Taiwan from next month to May 2024, a government official said on Tuesday, in a bid to draw in more tourists as high season approaches.翻译:一名政府官员周二表示，泰国将从下个月到 2024 年 5 月对来自印度和台湾的游客免除签证要求，以随着旺季的临近吸引更多游客。

Thailand in September scrapped visa requirements for Chinese tourists, the country's top pre-pandemic tourism market with 11 million of the record 39 million arrivals in 2019.翻译:泰国于 9 月取消了对中国游客的签证要求，中国游客是该国疫情前最大的旅游市场，2019 年入境游客人数达到创纪录的 3900 万人次，其中 1100 万人次。

From January to October 29, there were 22 million visitors to Thailand, generating 927.5 billion baht ($25.67 billion), according to the latest government data.翻译:根据最新的政府数据，从1月到10月29日，泰国共有2200万游客，创造了9275亿泰铢（256.7亿美元）的收入。

"Arrivals from India and Taiwan can enter Thailand for 30 days," spokesperson Chai Wacharonke said.翻译:发言人 Chai Wacharonke 表示：“来自印度和台湾的旅客可以进入泰国停留 30 天。”

India has been Thailand's fourth largest source market for tourism so far this year with about 1.2 million arrivals after Malaysia, China and South Korea.翻译:今年迄今为止，印度已成为泰国第四大旅游客源市场，接待游客约120万人次，仅次于马来西亚、中国和韩国。

Inbound tourism from India showed signs of growth as more airlines and hospitality chains targeted that market.翻译:随着越来越多的航空公司和连锁酒店瞄准该市场，印度入境旅游业显示出增长的迹象。

Thailand is targeting about 28 million arrivals this year, with the new government hoping the travel sector can offset continued weak exports that have constrained economic growth.翻译:泰国今年的目标是约 2800 万人次入境，新政府希望旅游业能够抵消出口持续疲弱的影响，从而限制经济增长。

($1 = 36.1300 baht)翻译:（1 美元 = 36.1300 泰铢）

Reporting by Panarat Thepgumpanat, writing by Chayut Setboonsarng; Editing by Martin Petty翻译:Panarat Thepgumpanat 报道，Chayut Setboonsarng 撰稿；马丁·佩蒂编辑

item.title: 亚洲股市因中国数据疲弱而下滑，日元因日本央行调整收益率控制而跳水
item.description:
Asian equities slipped on Tuesday, hovering close to a near one-year low, as manufacturing activity data from China disappointed while the yen weakened past 150 per dollar after the Bank of Japan tweaked its bond yield control policy.翻译:由于中国制造业活动数据令人失望，而日本央行调整债券收益率控制政策后日元兑美元汇率跌破150，亚洲股市周二下跌，徘徊在近一年低点附近。

The yen fell 0.7% against the dollar to touch a session low of 150.12 after the central bank maintained its target for the 10-year government bond yield around 0% set under its yield curve control (YCC) but redefined 1.0% as a loose "upper bound" rather than a rigid cap.翻译:日元兑美元下跌0.7%，触及盘中低点150.12，此前日本央行将其收益率曲线控制（YCC）下设定的10年期政府债券收益率目标维持在0%左右，但重新将1.0%重新定义为宽松“上限”而不是严格的上限。

Under criticism that its heavy defence of the cap is causing market distortions and an unwelcome yen fall, BOJ had raised its de-facto ceiling for the yield to 1.0% from 0.5% in July.翻译:由于对上限的严格保护导致市场扭曲和日元不受欢迎的下跌，日本央行在 7 月份将实际收益率上限从 0.5% 提高到了 1.0%。

Saxo market strategist Charu Chanana said the new reference range suggests the BOJ will allow yields to rise above 1%, while still trying to keep the changes to policy very subdued.翻译:盛宝银行市场策略师查鲁·查纳纳(Charu Chanana)表示，新的参考范围表明日本央行将允许收益率升至1%以上，同时仍试图保持政策变化非常温和。

"Speculation of an eventual removal of YCC will continue to build ... last week proved that dollar/yen at 150 is not a line in the sand, and this could bring a test of 152," Chanana said.翻译:“关于最终取消 YCC 的猜测将继续增加……上周证明，美元/日元在 150 的水平并不是板上钉钉的事情，这可能会带来 152 的考验，”查纳纳说。

The 10-year JGB had yet to trade following the announcement. The yield jumped 6.5 basis points earlier in the day to 0.955%, its highest since May 2013.翻译:公告发布后，10 年期日本国债尚未交易。当天早些时候，收益率上涨 6.5 个基点至 0.955%，为 2013 年 5 月以来的最高水平。

A report from the Nikkei newspaper on Monday that said BOJ is considering adjusting its yield curve control policy helped push the yen to a two-week peak of 148.81 per dollar but the fragile currency gave up all its gains after the BOJ decision.翻译:《日经新闻》周一报道称，日本央行正在考虑调整收益率曲线控制政策，推动日元汇率升至两周高点1美元兑148.81日元，但日元在日本央行决定后回吐了全部涨幅。

The central bank, which maintained its ultra-loose monetary policy, also removed a pledge to defend the 1% level with offers to buy unlimited amount of bonds.翻译:央行维持超宽松货币政策，也取消了捍卫1%水平的承诺，并提出无限量购买债券。

"(The) BOJ will buy some bonds around that (1%) level but not unlimited and they’ve shown their hand," said Tom Nash, portfolio manager at UBS Asset Management in Sydney.翻译:悉尼瑞银资产管理公司投资组合经理汤姆·纳什表示：“日本央行将购买一些围绕该水平（1%）的债券，但不是无限制的，他们已经表明了自己的立场。”

"Through all the linguistic contortions, the fact is that they are dismantling YCC. A yield cap isn’t a yield cap if you change it every time the market gets close."翻译:“通过所有的语言扭曲，事实是他们正在拆除 YCC。如果你每次市场收盘时都改变收益率上限，那么收益率上限就不再是收益率上限。”

CHINA DATA SPOOKS MARKETS

Stocks in Asia fell, with MSCI's broadest index of Asia-Pacific shares outside Japan (.MIAPJ0000PUS) 0.86% lower, hovering close to the one-year low it touched last week.翻译:亚洲股市下跌，摩根士丹利资本国际(MSCI)日本以外亚太地区最广泛股票指数(.MIAPJ0000PUS)下跌0.86%，徘徊在上周触及的一年低点附近。

The Shanghai Composite Index (.SSEC) was 0.38% lower, while Hong Kong's Hang Seng Index (.HSI) fell 1.77% after China's manufacturing activity unexpectedly returned to contraction in October, an official factory survey showed on Tuesday.翻译:周二官方工厂调查显示，在中国 10 月份制造业活动意外恢复收缩后，上证综指(.SSEC ) 下跌 0.38%，香港恒生指数(.HSI)下跌 1.77%。

The data cast a cloud over recent indicators that showed a nascent recovery in the world's second-largest economy.翻译:这些数据给近期显示世界第二大经济体刚刚复苏的指标蒙上了一层阴影。

Investor focus this week will mainly be on the major central bank meetings, with the U.S. Federal Reserve and Bank of England also due to meet along with BOJ.翻译:本周投资者的焦点将主要集中在主要央行会议上，美联储和英格兰银行也将与日本央行一起召开会议。

On Tuesday, the Federal Open Markets Committee (FOMC) will convene for a two-day monetary policy meeting, which is expected to culminate in a decision to let the Fed funds target rate stand at 5.25%-5.50%.翻译:周二，联邦公开市场委员会（FOMC）将召开为期两天的货币政策会议，预计最终将决定联邦基金目标利率维持在5.25%-5.50%。

A slew of recent data showed the U.S. economy remains resilient and comments from Fed Chair Jerome Powell will be scrutinized to gauge how long interest rates are likely to stay elevated.翻译:最近的一系列数据显示美国经济仍然具有弹性，美联储主席杰罗姆·鲍威尔的言论将受到仔细审查，以判断利率可能会保持高位多久。

The Treasury Department said on Monday it expects to borrow $76 billion less this quarter than anticipated in the third quarter on expectations of higher revenue receipts.翻译:美国财政部周一表示，由于收入预期增加，预计本季度借款比第三季度预期减少 760 亿美元。

The yield on 10-year Treasury notes was flat at 4.875%.翻译:10 年期国债收益率持平于 4.875%。

The dollar index , which measures U.S. currency against six rivals, rose 0.226%. Sterling was last trading at $1.2145, down 0.18% on the day, while the euro was down 0.2% at $1.0594.翻译:衡量美元兑六种货币的美元指数上涨 0.226%。英镑最新交易价格为1.2145美元，当日下跌0.18%，欧元兑美元下跌0.2%，至1.0594美元。

U.S. crude rose 0.36% to $82.61 per barrel and Brent was at $87.81, up 0.41% on the day.翻译:美国原油上涨0.36%至每桶82.61美元，布伦特原油上涨0.41%至87.81美元。

Gold prices were flat after slipping below the $2,000/ounce milestone in the last session. Spot gold eased 0.2% to $1,991.39.翻译:金价在上一交易日跌破 2,000 美元/盎司的里程碑后持平。现货黄金下跌 0.2%，至 1,991.39 美元。

Reporting by Ankur Banerjee in Singapore; Editing by Lincoln Feast and Kim Coghill翻译:Ankur Banerjee 新加坡报道；林肯·法斯特和金·科吉尔编辑

item.title: 10月份中国工厂活动意外萎缩，削弱复苏势头
item.description:
Summary:
  • Manufacturing PMI unexpectedly falls翻译:制造业PMI意外下降
  • Non-manufacturing PMI falls, as services and construction slow翻译:由于服务业和建筑业放缓，非制造业 PMI 下降
  • Metals prices and offshore yuan drop on PMI weakness翻译:PMI 疲软导致金属价格和离岸人民币下跌
  • Weak global economy, property crisis threaten growth - analysts翻译:分析师称全球经济疲软、房地产危机威胁增长

China's manufacturing activity unexpectedly contracted in October, underlining the daunting task facing policymakers as they try to revitalise economic growth heading into the end of the year and 2024 amid multiple challenges at home and abroad.翻译:中国10月份制造业活动意外收缩，突显政策制定者在面临国内外多重挑战的情况下，在年底和2024年试图重振经济增长时面临的艰巨任务。

Recent indicators pointed to encouraging signs of stabilising in the world's second-largest economy, supported by a flurry of policy support measures, although a protracted property crisis and soft global demand remain major headwinds.翻译:最近的指标显示，在一系列政策支持措施的支持下，世界第二大经济体出现了令人鼓舞的企稳迹象，尽管旷日持久的房地产危机和全球需求疲软仍然是主要阻力。

The official purchasing managers' index (PMI) fell to 49.5 in October from 50.2, dipping back below the 50-point level demarcating contraction from expansion, data from the National Bureau of Statistics showed on Tuesday. It missed a forecast of 50.2 and was worse than the most pessimistic prediction of 49.9 by Standard Chartered in a Reuters poll.翻译:国家统计局周二公布的数据显示，10 月份官方采购经理人指数 (PMI) 从 50.2 降至 49.5，跌破 50 点的收缩与扩张界限。它未达到预期的 50.2，也低于渣打银行在路透调查中最悲观的预测 49.9。

The non-manufacturing PMI also fell to 50.6 last from 51.7 in September, indicating a slowdown in activity in the vast service sector and construction.翻译:非制造业采购经理人指数也从 9 月份的 51.7 降至 50.6，表明庞大的服务业和建筑业活动放缓。

"The weak PMI data may reflect some of the weakness in demand related to the housing slump and a slowdown in infrastructure spending," said Xu Tianchen, senior economist at the Economist Intelligence Unit.翻译:经济学人智库高级经济学家徐天辰表示：“PMI数据疲软可能反映出与房地产市场低迷和基础设施支出放缓相关的部分需求疲软。”

"Although there are signs of exports bottoming out, a strong recovery in external demand is probably elusive," he added.翻译:“尽管有出口触底反弹的迹象，但外部需求的强劲复苏可能难以实现，”他补充道。

Both new export and imports orders shrank for an eight consecutive month, suggesting that manufacturers were struggling for buyers overseas and ordering fewer components used in finished goods for re-export.翻译:新出口和进口订单连续八个月萎缩，表明制造商正在努力争取海外买家，并且订购用于再出口的制成品的零部件减少。

Foreign buyers returned in force for the autumn round of the Canton Fair in Guangzhou, the world's largest trade show, but Chinese sellers said orders remain low as Christmas nears, with few expecting global demand to recover soon.翻译:外国买家大批回归参加全球最大的贸易展——广州秋季广交会，但中国卖家表示，随着圣诞节临近，订单仍然很低，很少有人预计全球需求会很快复苏。

"Given that PMI is a month-on-month indicator, the falling figure in October doesn't reflect much of a change in demand but an adjustment in supply," said Dan Wang, chief economist at Hang Seng Bank China.翻译:恒生银行中国首席经济学家王丹表示，鉴于PMI是环比指标，10月份的下降反映的并不是需求的太大变化，而是供给的调整。

"Production in September was visibly better than in previous months due to improved domestic demand, which squeezed down industrial prices. In October, we saw a wider effort in the industrial sector to cut supply to cope with a profit squeeze."翻译:“由于国内需求改善，压低了工业价格，9月份的生产明显好于前几个月。10月份，我们看到工业部门更广泛地减少供应以应对利润挤压。”

The squeeze on business profits was underscored by factory gate prices contracting sharply this month, a sub-index in the PMI survey showed.翻译:PMI 调查中的一项分项指数显示，本月工厂出厂价格大幅收缩，凸显了企业利润受到挤压。

Prices of most nonferrous metals fell following the data release. China accounts for more than half of the global consumption of most base metals, which are widely used in the manufacturing sector.翻译:数据公布后，大多数有色金属价格下跌。中国占全球大部分基本金属消费量的一半以上，这些基本金属广泛应用于制造业。

In the currency market, the offshore yuan dropped after the PMI survey.翻译:货币市场方面，PMI调查后离岸人民币下跌。

MORE SUPPORT NEEDED

Policymakers have since June unveiled a raft of measures after a rapid loss of economic momentum following a brief post-COVID rebound, including modest interest rate cuts, increased cash injections and more aggressive fiscal stimulus.翻译:在疫情后短暂反弹后经济动力迅速丧失后，政策制定者自 6 月以来推出了一系列措施，包括适度降息、增加现金注入和更积极的财政刺激。

But analysts say more policy support may be needed to ensure the economy reaches Beijing's annual gross domestic product (GDP) target of about 5%.翻译:但分析人士表示，可能需要更多政策支持才能确保经济达到北京约5%的年度国内生产总值(GDP)目标。

Some government advisers are recommending China lifts its 2024 budget deficit target beyond the 3% of GDP set for this year, which would allow Beijing to issue more bonds to revive the economy.翻译:一些政府顾问建议中国将 2024 年预算赤字目标提高到今年设定的 GDP 的 3% 以上，这将使北京能够发行更多债券来重振经济。

HSBC on Monday said it believed the worst may be over for China's shaky commercial real estate market, as a further $500 million charge from the sector dragged the bank's third quarter profits below forecasts.翻译:汇丰银行周一表示，相信中国摇摇欲坠的商业房地产市场最糟糕的时期可能已经过去，因为该行业的进一步5亿美元费用拖累该银行第三季度利润低于预期。

Yet, the overall real estate industry, which accounts for almost a fourth of the country's economic output, has shown few signs of turning a decisive corner since plunging into debt crisis two years ago.翻译:然而，占该国经济产出近四分之一的整个房地产行业自两年前陷入债务危机以来，几乎没有显示出扭转局面的迹象。

Data out this month showed China's new home prices fell for a third straight month in September, a traditionally peak home buying period, while property sales and investment extended double-digit declines. High youth unemployment, elevated debt levels and a weakened yuan are also complicating Beijing's efforts to revive activity.翻译:本月公布的数据显示，9月份是传统的购房高峰期，中国新建住宅价格连续第三个月下跌，而房地产销售和投资则延续了两位数的跌幅。青年失业率高、债务水平高以及人民币贬值也让北京方面重振经济的努力变得更加复杂。

China's top parliamentary body last week approved a 1 trillion yuan ($137 billion) sovereign bond issue in the fourth quarter, and passed a bill allowing local governments to front load part of their 2024 bond quotas to support investment and economic growth.翻译:中国最高人大机构上周批准了第四季度发行1万亿元人民币（1370亿美元）的主权债券，并通过了一项法案，允许地方政府提前加载2024年的部分债券配额，以支持投资和经济增长。

And earlier this month, the central bank injected the biggest cash support since late 2020 via short-term policy loans to allow banks to extend credit as well as keep interest rates low.翻译:本月早些时候，央行通过短期政策贷款注入了自2020年底以来最大的现金支持，以允许银行扩大信贷并保持低利率。

"The additional 1 trillion yuan will help in November and December," Economist Intelligence Unit's Xu said.翻译:经济学人智库的徐说：“额外的1万亿元人民币将在11月和12月有所帮助。”

Reporting by Joe Cash. Editing by Sam Holmes and Shri Navaratnam翻译:乔·卡什报道。山姆·霍姆斯和 Shri Navaratnam 编辑

item.title: 日本央行基本维持现状但调整收益率上限，日元下跌
item.description:
The yen weakened on Tuesday after the Bank of Japan (BOJ) maintained ultra-low rates but made a small tweak to its bond yield control policy, disappointing speculators who had expected more from the central bank as price pressures persist.翻译:日本央行(BOJ)维持超低利率，但对其债券收益率控制政策进行小幅调整，令投机者失望，因为价格压力持续存在，他们原本期望央行采取更多措施，导致日元走软。

At the conclusion of its two-day policy meeting, the BOJ said that it would keep the 10-year government bond yield around 0% set under its yield curve control (YCC), but re-defined 1.0% as a loose "upper bound" rather than a rigid cap.翻译:日本央行在为期两天的政策会议结束时表示，将在收益率曲线控制（YCC）下将 10 年期政府债券收益率维持在 0% 左右，但重新将 1.0% 定义为宽松的“上限” “而不是严格的上限。

It also removed a pledge to defend the level with offers to buy unlimited amount of bonds.翻译:它还取消了通过购买无限量债券来捍卫这一水平的承诺。

Nonetheless, the yen slid nearly 0.7% against the dollar , past the 150 per dollar threshold to hit an intraday low of 150.12. It later pared some of those losses to stand at 149.95.翻译:尽管如此，日元兑美元仍下跌近0.7%，突破150兑美元关口，触及日内低点150.12。随后，该指数将部分跌幅收窄至 149.95 美元。

The euro similarly jumped about 0.5% against the yen following the decision . The single currency last bought 158.87 yen.翻译:决定公布后，欧元兑日元汇率同样上涨约 0.5%。单一货币最后买入 158.87 日元。

"It looks like the BOJ is slowly progressing towards YCC removal, so this is part of a series of moves for more flexibility as global yields stay elevated," said Jeff Ng, head of Asia macro strategy at SMBC.翻译:SMBC 亚洲宏观策略主管 Jeff Ng 表示：“看起来日本央行正在缓慢推进取消 YCC 的进程，因此这是在全球收益率保持高位之际为提高灵活性而采取的一系列举措的一部分。”

"Maybe markets were expecting more, or it could also be a (matter of) buy the rumour, sell the fact."翻译:“也许市场期待更多，或者也可能是买谣言、卖事实。”

A Nikkei report had said on Monday that the BOJ could potentially allow 10-year Japanese government bond yields to rise above 1%, which had propped up the yen prior to the central bank's policy announcement.翻译:日经新闻周一报道称，日本央行可能允许 10 年期日本政府债券收益率升至 1% 以上，这在央行宣布政策之前曾支撑日元。

In other currencies, the greenback edged broadly higher, with the dollar index last up 0.22% at 106.39.翻译:其他货币方面，美元普遍走高，美元指数最新上涨0.22%至106.39。

While the index looked set to end the month largely unchanged, analysts say the dollar remains underpinned by risks of another rate hike from the Federal Reserve, noting a still-resilient U.S. economy.翻译:尽管该指数看起来月底基本保持不变，但分析师表示，美元仍受到美联储再次加息风险的支撑，并指出美国经济仍然具有弹性。

"The Fed can still have the luxury of sounding hawkish in its outlook, by stressing the 'high for long' narrative," said Thierry Wizman, Macquarie's global FX and interest rates strategist, of the Fed's rate decision due on Wednesday.翻译:麦格理全球外汇和利率策略师蒂埃里·维兹曼(Thierry Wizman)在谈到周三公布的美联储利率决定时表示，“通过强调‘长期高位’的说法，美联储仍然可以在前景上听起来强硬。”

"As long as that's still the case, and as long as the U.S. economy displays more robustness in its official data than the rest of the world does, the euro, sterling, yen and Australian dollar will have a tough go at appreciating vs the U.S. dollar."翻译:“只要情况仍然如此，只要美国经济在其官方数据中表现出比世界其他地区更加强劲的表现，欧元、英镑、日元和澳元相对于美元就会很难升值美元。”

The euro looked set to reverse two straight months of losses with a slight 0.2% gain for October, with the single currency last 0.18% lower at $1.0595.翻译:欧元有望扭转连续两个月的跌势，10 月份小幅上涨 0.2%，欧元最后下跌 0.18%，至 1.0595 美元。

Data on Monday showed inflation in Germany eased noticeably in October, while a separate report showed Europe's largest economy shrank slightly in the third quarter.翻译:周一的数据显示，德国十月份通胀明显放缓，而另一份报告显示，欧洲最大经济体第三季度略有萎缩。

Spain's 12-month inflation in October was unchanged from the previous month at 3.5%, preliminary data also out on Monday showed.翻译:周一公布的初步数据显示，西班牙 10 月份 12 个月通胀率与上月持平，为 3.5%。

The figures come ahead of euro zone inflation data due later on Tuesday.翻译:这些数据是在周二晚些时候公布的欧元区通胀数据之前公布的。

Sterling fell 0.18% to $1.2146 and was poised to lose nearly 0.5% for the month, ahead of an interest rate decision by the Bank of England later in the week where expectations are for the central bank to stand pat.翻译:英镑下跌 0.18% 至 1.2146 美元，本月预计下跌近 0.5%，而本周晚些时候英国央行将做出利率决定， 预计央行将按兵不动。

Elsewhere, the Australian dollar slid 0.35% to $0.6351 and was headed for a monthly loss of more than 1%.翻译:其他方面，澳元兑美元下跌 0.35% 至 0.6351 美元，月度跌幅将超过 1%。

The New Zealand dollar lost 0.22% to stand at $0.5831 and was set for a nearly 3% decline for October, pressured by fragile risk sentiment globally and as a surprisingly low reading on domestic inflation in the third quarter lessened the chance of another rate hike.翻译:新西兰元下跌 0.22%，至 0.5831 美元，预计 10 月份将下跌近 3%，原因是全球脆弱的风险情绪以及第三季度国内通胀数据出人意​​料的低水平降低了再次加息的可能性。

Reporting by Rae Wee Editing by Shri Navaratnam, Simon Cameron-Moore and Kim Coghill翻译:Rae Wee 报道 Shri Navaratnam、Simon Cameron-Moore 和 Kim Coghill 编辑

item.title: 由于供应担忧抵消了疲软的中国数据，油价小幅上涨
item.description:
Oil prices rose in Asian trade on Tuesday, after a drop of more than 3% in the previous session, as worries over supply stirred by conflict in the Middle East blunted a dismal showing of China data.翻译:由于中东冲突引发的供应担忧削弱了中国数据的惨淡表现，油价在前一交易日下跌超过 3% 后，周二在亚洲交易中上涨。

December Brent crude futures , set to expire on Tuesday, rose 36 cents, or 0.41%, to stand at $87.81 a barrel by 0305 GMT. The more heavily traded January Brent crude futures climbed 29 cents, or 0.34%，to $86.64 a barrel.翻译:截至格林威治标准时间 0305，将于周二到期的 12 月布伦特原油期货上涨 36 美分，涨幅为 0.41%，至每桶 87.81 美元。交易较为活跃的 1 月布伦特原油期货上涨 29 美分，涨幅为 0.34%，至每桶 86.64 美元。

U.S. West Texas Intermediate crude increased 34 cents, or 0.41%, to $82.65 a barrel.翻译:美国西德克萨斯中质原油上涨 34 美分，涨幅 0.41%，至每桶 82.65 美元。

Oil fell more than 3% on Monday as investors grew cautious ahead of Wednesday's U.S. Federal Reserve meeting, despite an escalation of Israel's attacks on Gaza.翻译:尽管以色列对加沙的袭击升级，但由于投资者在周三的美联储会议之前变得谨慎，周一油价下跌超过 3%。

"Although it implemented a ground attack, it also retreated very quickly and Iran is currently only resorting to verbal deterrence," said CMC Markets' analyst Leon Li, who is based in the Chinese commercial hub of Shanghai.翻译:CMC Markets驻中国商业中心上海的分析师Leon Li表示：“虽然它实施了地面攻击，但撤退的速度也很快，伊朗目前只能诉诸口头威慑。”

"If this evolves into a full-scale invasion and there is involvement from Iran, tighter supply worries could resurface."翻译:“如果这演变成全面入侵并且伊朗介入，供应紧张的担忧可能会重新浮现。”

Prices had rebounded on a technical correction earlier on Tuesday and market upside now hangs on whether Israel expands its ground offensive, he added.翻译:他补充说，周二早些时候价格因技术调整而反弹，目前市场上行取决于以色列是否扩大地面攻势。

In a note, ING analysts said, "Disruptions to Iranian oil flows remain the most obvious risk to the market."翻译:ING分析师在一份报告中表示，“伊朗石油流动中断仍然是市场最明显的风险。”

Such lost supply could range between 500,000 barrels per day (bpd) and 1 million bpd if the United States strictly enforces sanctions once again, they added, although Middle East developments had yet to affect oil supply.翻译:他们补充说，如果美国再次严格执行制裁，供应损失可能会在每天 50 万桶到 100 万桶之间，尽管中东事态发展尚未影响石油供应。

Weaker-than-expected manufacturing and non-manufacturing activity data from China stoked fears of slowing fuel demand from the world's No. 2 oil consumer.翻译:中国制造业和非制造业活动数据弱于预期，引发了人们对世界第二大石油消费国燃料需求放缓的担忧。

Its official purchasing managers' index missed a forecast and dipped back below the 50-point level separating contraction from expansion.翻译:其官方采购经理人指数未达预期，回落至收缩与扩张之间的 50 点以下。

Prices gained some support from concern over prospects for crude exports from Venezuela, riven by election uncertainty.翻译:由于选举的不确定性，对委内瑞拉原油出口前景的担忧使价格获得了一些支撑。

The Supreme Court's suspension of the results of this month's opposition presidential primary is likely to call into question whether the United States will keep up its relief from sanctions for Venezuela, the ING analysts said.翻译:ING分析师表示，最高法院暂停本月反对派总统初选的结果可能会让人质疑美国是否会继续解除对委内瑞拉的制裁。

The U.S. had recently decided to ease sanctions in return for the promise of fairer elections in 2024, they added.翻译:他们补充说，美国最近决定放松制裁，以换取 2024 年举行更公平选举的承诺。

Markets were also keeping a close eye on the U.S. central bank meeting, which affects domestic fuel demand, despite a high likelihood of interest rates keeping steady, according to a poll by CME's Fedwatch tool.翻译:芝商所美联储观察工具的一项民意调查显示，尽管利率很有可能保持稳定，但市场也在密切关注美国央行会议，该会议影响了国内燃料需求。

Reporting by Laura Sanicola and Trixie Yap; Editing by Clarence Fernandez翻译:Laura Sanicola 和 Trixie Yap 报道；克拉伦斯·费尔南德斯编辑

item.title: 阿里AI模型升级统一钱文，发布行业模型
item.description:
Chinese technology giant Alibaba (9988.HK) said on Tuesday it has updated its artificial intelligence (AI) model Tongyi Qianwen and released a suite of industry-specific AI models amid an intensifying AI race among tech companies.翻译:中国科技巨头阿里巴巴（9988.HK）周二表示，在科技公司之间的人工智能竞赛愈演愈烈之际，该公司已更新其人工智能（AI）模型统一钱文，并发布了一套针对特定行业的人工智能模型。

Alibaba's cloud computing arm at its annual conference in Hangzhou said Tongyi Qianwen 2.0 has "hundreds of billions of" parameters - a benchmark used to measure AI model power - making it one of the world's most powerful AI models by that metric.翻译:阿里巴巴云计算部门在杭州举行的年度会议上表示，统一钱文2.0拥有“数千亿”参数（用于衡量人工智能模型能力的基准），使其成为世界上最强大的人工智能模型之一。

It also said it has launched eight AI models for the entertainment, finance, healthcare and legal industries.翻译:它还表示已经为娱乐、金融、医疗保健和法律行业推出了八种人工智能模型。

The upgrade comes just six months after the model's initial release, reflecting the pace at which tech companies are racing to control China's nascent and quickly expanding AI market.翻译:此次升级是在该模型首次发布六个月后进行的，反映出科技公司竞相控制中国新兴且快速扩张的人工智能市场的步伐。

Rival Tencent (0700.HK) last month said China was in the middle of a "war of a hundred models", with over 130 flooding the market. Tencent said its Hunyuan AI has more than 100 billion parameters and exceeds OpenAI's GPT-4 model in processing Chinese.翻译:竞争对手腾讯（0700.HK）上个月表示，中国正处于“ 百款大战”之中，超过130款产品涌入市场。腾讯表示，其混元AI拥有超过1000亿个参数，在处理中文方面超过了OpenAI的GPT-4模型。

The GPT-3 AI model from Microsoft-backed (MSFT.O) OpenAI contained 175 billion parameters in 2020 and Meta Platform's (META.O) Llama 2 model had 70 billion parameters in 2023.翻译:微软支持的(MSFT.O) OpenAI 的 GPT-3 AI 模型到 2020 年将包含 1750 亿个参数，Meta Platform (META.O) Llama 2 模型到 2023 年将包含 700 亿个参数。

Alibaba's industry-specific models went online on Tuesday, offering dedicated tools for creating images, writing computer code, analysing financial data and searching for legal documents.翻译:阿里巴巴的行业特定模型于周二上线，提供了用于创建图像、编写计算机代码、分析财务数据和搜索法律文件的专用工具。

At the conference, Chairman Joe Tsai also said about half of large-language AI models in the China now run on Alibaba Cloud.翻译:会上，蔡崇信董事长还表示，目前中国约一半的大语言人工智能模型都运行在阿里云上。

He said Alibaba's AI model-sharing platform ModelScope now features 2,300 models and 2.7 million contributing developers.翻译:他表示，阿里巴巴的人工智能模型共享平台ModelScope目前拥有2300个模型和270万贡献开发者。

Reporting by Josh Ye and Brenda Goh; Editing by Jacqueline Wong and Christopher Cushing翻译:Josh Ye 和 Brenda Goh 报道；编辑：杰奎琳·黄和克里斯托弗·库欣

item.title: 独家：由于农作物受损刺激购买热潮，中国抢购澳大利亚和法国小麦
item.description:
Summary:
  • China has bought around 2 mln T of Australia new-crop wheat翻译:中国购买了约200万吨澳大利亚新茬小麦
  • Around 2.5 mln T of French wheat has been sold to China翻译:约250万吨法国小麦已销往中国
  • Large imports of Australian wheat to tighten Asian supplies翻译:大量进口澳大利亚小麦导致亚洲供应紧张
  • Nearly 25 mln T or around 20% of China's crop damaged by rains翻译:近2500万吨，即中国约20%的农作物因降雨受损

China is set to import record volumes of wheat this year, trading sources say, with rain damage to its crop and worries over dry weather in exporting nations fuelling Beijing's appetite to buy while prices are low.翻译:贸易消息人士称，中国今年的小麦进口量将创历史新高，降雨对其作物造成损害，而出口国对干旱天气的担忧刺激了北京在价格较低的情况下的购买欲望。

Traders said China's frantic buying is likely to support global prices, which have dropped more than a quarter this year - based on the Chicago futures benchmark price - amid abundant supplies from top exporter Russia.翻译:交易商表示，中国的疯狂购买可能会支撑全球价格，根据芝加哥期货基准价格，由于最大出口国俄罗斯供应充足，全球价格今年已下跌超过四分之一。

The world's biggest wheat producer and consumer, China bought around two million metric tons of new-crop Australian wheat in October, for shipments starting in December, trading sources told Reuters. It has also booked about 2.5 million metric tons of French wheat since September, for December-March shipment, they said, noting these were unusually large volumes for this time of year.翻译:贸易消息人士告诉路透社，作为全球最大的小麦生产国和消费国，中国在 10 月份购买了约 200 万吨澳大利亚新作小麦，并于 12 月份开始发货。他们表示，自 9 月份以来，该公司还订购了约 250 万吨法国小麦，用于 12 月至 3 月装运，并指出，这些数量对于每年的这个时候来说是异常大的。

Overall, China's 2023 imports are likely to reach around 12 million tons, two Singapore-based traders said, topping 2022's record 9.96 million tons, and the avid buying is expected to continue into 2024.翻译:两位新加坡贸易商表示，总体而言，中国 2023 年的进口量可能达到 1200 万吨左右，超过 2022 年创纪录的 996 万吨，而狂热的购买预计将持续到 2024 年。

"China has had problems with crop quality this year and Australia, which is the main wheat supplier to China, is going to have a much smaller crop," said one of the Singapore traders, who is at an international company which sells wheat to China.翻译:一位就职于一家向中国销售小麦的国际公司的新加坡贸易商表示：“中国今年的农作物质量出现了问题，而作为中国主要小麦供应国的澳大利亚的产量将会大幅减少。” 。

"They are buying as much as they can and as early as possible. Supplies are going to eventually tighten, especially from Australia," the trader said.翻译:“他们正在尽可能多地、尽早购买。供应最终将趋紧，尤其是来自澳大利亚的供应，”该贸易商表示。

China has said its wheat crop shrank 0.9% this year to 134.5 million tons, the first decline in seven years despite expanded acreage, after heavy rain battered mature grain in the key central growing region just before the harvest. read more 翻译:中国表示，今年小麦产量减少了0.9%，至1.345亿吨，尽管播种面积有所扩大，但由于大雨袭击了中部主要产区成熟的谷物，收获前夕，小麦产量仍出现了七年来的首次下降。 阅读更多

Beijing has not provided a crop quality assessment.翻译:北京尚未提供农作物质量评估。

However, according to estimates by the two Singapore traders and one dealer in Sydney, around 25 million tons or about 20% of China's harvest this year was damaged by rains. Some of that rain-damaged wheat will only be fit for animal feed or for blending with higher quality imported wheat before being milled into flour.翻译:然而，根据两名新加坡贸易商和一名悉尼经销商的估计，中国今年的收成因降雨而受损，约2500万吨，约占中国收成的20%。一些被雨水损坏的小麦只适合用作动物饲料或在磨成面粉之前与更高品质的进口小麦混合。

China's agriculture ministry did not immediately respond to a request for comment.翻译:中国农业部没有立即回应置评请求。

The world's biggest hog producer, China's Muyuan Foods has benefitted from the availability of rain damaged wheat. Muyuan told investors on Friday that purchases of germinated wheat, which occurs when mature plants get wet and can no longer be used for milling, contributed significantly to lowering production costs.翻译:全球最大的生猪生产商中国牧原食品公司受益于雨灾小麦的供应。牧原周五告诉投资者，购买发芽小麦（当成熟的小麦变湿而不能再用于制粉时）会显着降低生产成本。

"Australia has the opportunity to fill the quality gap that China is currently suffering, particularly for high protein milling wheat," said Stefan Meyer, a grains broker at StoneX in Sydney.翻译:悉尼 StoneX 谷物经纪人斯特凡·迈耶 (Stefan Meyer) 表示：“澳大利亚有机会填补中国目前面临的质量差距，特别是高蛋白磨粉小麦。”

While wheat output in Australia, the world's second largest exporter, is forecast to drop to 26 million metric tons, down from last season's record 39.7 million tons, due to dryness from the El Nino weather pattern, the quality is better this year as dry weather results in higher protein content.翻译:虽然由于厄尔尼诺天气造成的干旱，全球第二大出口国澳大利亚的小麦产量预计将从上一季创纪录的 3970 万吨降至 2600 万吨，但由于天气干燥，今年的质量会更好导致更高的蛋白质含量。

Ma Wenfeng, senior analyst at Beijing Orient Agribusiness Consultancy, said a lower share of China's wheat harvest - about 20 million tons - was unsuitable for high-quality milling, although a portion of it can be used after cleaning.翻译:北京东方农业咨询公司高级分析师马文峰表示，中国小麦收成比例较低（约2000万吨），不适合高质量制粉，尽管其中一部分可以在清理后使用。

Ma and others in China said attractive prices were a bigger driver of China's imports.翻译:马云和中国的其他人表示，有吸引力的价格是中国进口的更大推动力。

"Price is the main reason - it's really cheap," said Rosa Wang, analyst at Shanghai JC Intelligence Co Ltd, adding that翻译:上海JC Intelligence Co Ltd分析师罗莎·王(Rosa Wang)表示：“价格是主要原因——它真的很便宜。”她补充道

China was probably looking at the mounting weather risks in top exporting countries and "making preparations" for next year.翻译:中国可能正在考虑主要出口国日益加剧的天气风险，并为明年“做准备”。

MORE TO COME

China's January-September wheat imports jumped 53.6% to 10.17 million metric tons, customs data showed, including 6.4 million tons from Australia and 1.8 million tons from Canada. Those figures don't reflect orders made for future delivery, such as recent purchases of U.S. soft red winter wheat.翻译:海关数据显示，中国1-9月小麦进口量猛增53.6%至1017万吨，其中来自澳大利亚的640万吨，来自加拿大的180万吨。这些数字并不反映未来交货的订单，例如最近购买的美国软红冬小麦。

Unlike other commodities, China's imports of Australian wheat were largely unaffected by the bilateral tensions between the two governments in recent years. Indeed, those tensions have eased in recent months.翻译:与其他商品不同，中国进口澳大利亚小麦基本上没有受到近年来两国政府双边紧张局势的影响。事实上，近几个月这些紧张局势有所缓解。

Beijing's heavy buying from Australia could force rival importers such as Indonesia and Japan to seek alternatives from North America and the Black Sea region, traders said.翻译:贸易商表示，北京从澳大利亚大量购买可能会迫使印度尼西亚和日本等竞争对手进口商从北美和黑海地区寻求替代品。

Chinese wheat purchases have stabilised global wheat prices, one of the Singapore traders said.翻译:一位新加坡贸易商表示，中国的小麦采购稳定了全球小麦价格。

"But we expect prices to rise going forward, when China starts taking more volumes of higher quality wheat from the U.S. as Australian supplies are going to tighten," the trader said.翻译:“但我们预计未来价格将会上涨，因为澳大利亚供应将趋紧，中国开始从美国进口更多优质小麦，”该贸易商表示。

Given lower output in Australia, traders and analysts said China is likely to import significantly higher volumes of French wheat in the coming months.翻译:鉴于澳大利亚产量下降，交易商和分析师表示，未来几个月中国可能会大幅增加进口法国小麦的数量。

"With the U.S. having a slightly larger spring wheat crop, a type of wheat that can very much act as an 'improver' supply for many importers, we would not be surprised to see China seek some U.S. and maybe Canadian Spring wheat," said Jeffrey McPike, a U.S. analyst with brokerage WASDEA Commodities.翻译:“由于美国春小麦产量略高，这种小麦可以为许多进口商提供‘改善’供应，因此看到中国寻求一些美国甚至加拿大春小麦，我们不会感到惊讶，”他说。杰弗里·麦克派克（Jeffrey McPike）是 WASDEA Commodities 经纪公司的美国分析师。

Reporting by Naveen Thukral and Dominique Patton; additional reporting by Peter Hobson in Canberra, Gus Trompiz in Paris and Julie Ingwersen in Chicago Editing by Tony Munroe & Simon Cameron-Moore翻译:纳文·图克拉尔和多米尼克·巴顿的报道； Peter Hobson 在堪培拉、Gus Trompiz 在巴黎以及 Julie Ingwersen 在芝加哥的补充报道 Tony Munroe 和 Simon Cameron-Moore 编辑

item.description:
The Philippines National Security Adviser on Tuesday said Manila's vessel did not illegally enter any space under Chinese sovereignty and called on China to stop "its aggressive action in Philippine waters".翻译:菲律宾国家安全顾问周二表示，马尼拉的船只没有非法进入中国主权下的任何区域，并呼吁中国停止“在菲律宾水域的侵略行动”。

The remarks came after the Chinese military on Monday said a Philippine vessel "illegally entered" waters near Scarborough Shoal in the South China Sea without authorisation.翻译:此前， 中国军方周一表示，一艘菲律宾船只未经授权“非法进入”南海黄岩岛附近海域。

item.title: Yoon表示韩国经济增长将在2024年超过潜在增长率
item.description:
South Korean President Yoon Suk Yeol said on Tuesday the economy in 2024 would exceed the potential growth rate after picking up pace in the second half of 2023, and pledged closer ties with the United States to bolster crisis management capabilities.翻译:韩国总统尹锡烈周二表示，继 2023 年下半年加速增长后，2024 年经济将超过潜在增长率，并承诺与美国建立更密切的关系，以增强危机管理能力。

The government is closely monitoring the economic and security situations and prepared to take response measures in a timely manner, Yoon said in a speech to parliament on next year's proposed budget.翻译:尹在议会就明年的拟议预算发表讲话时表示，政府正在密切关注经济和安全局势，并准备及时采取应对措施。

"The pace of economic growth will continue to expand in the second half of the year as forecast earlier ... and by next year it will recover beyond the level of the potential growth rate and record a higher rate than major countries," he said.翻译:他表示：“正如此前预测的那样，下半年经济增长步伐将继续加快……到明年将恢复到超越潜在增长率水平，并创出高于主要国家的增速。” 。

South Korea's potential growth rate - the maximum economic growth that can be achieved without triggering inflationary pressure - is estimated to be around 2%, policymakers have said.翻译:政策制定者表示，韩国的潜在增长率（在不引发通胀压力的情况下可以实现的最大经济增长率）估计约为 2%。

Gross domestic product (GDP) grew 0.6% in the July-September quarter from three months earlier, Bank of Korea data showed last week, the same pace as the prior quarter and beating a median 0.5% increase forecast in a Reuters survey.翻译:韩国央行上周的数据显示，7月至9月季度国内生产总值(GDP)较三个月前增长0.6% ，与上一季度持平，超过路透调查中0.5%的增幅预测中值。

In a Reuters survey conducted early this month, economic growth was forecast to slow to 1.2% in 2023 from 2.6% in 2022, followed by a recovery to 2.1% in 2024.翻译:路透社本月初进行的一项调查显示，预计2023年经济增长将从2022年的2.6%放缓至1.2%，随后在2024年恢复至2.1%。

The forecasts compare with the government's projection of 1.4% growth this year and 2.4% next year.翻译:该预测与政府今年和明年 1.4% 和 2.4% 的增长预测相比较。

The government in August unveiled its 2024 budget plan that included the smallest increase in two decades amid weakening tax revenue due to slower economic growth.翻译:政府于 8 月公布了 2024 年预算计划，其中包括二十年来最小的增幅，原因是经济增长放缓导致税收收入疲软。

The 656.9 trillion won ($487 billion) government expenditure plan for 2024 was 2.8% higher than 2023.翻译:2024 年政府支出计划为 656.9 万亿韩元（4870 亿美元），比 2023 年增加 2.8%。

Yoon again stressed the importance of fiscal discipline to help stabilise domestic inflation and sustain the country's credit ratings.翻译:尹再次强调财政纪律对于帮助稳定国内通胀和维持国家信用评级的重要性。

Yoon highlighted his priority on maintaining security ties with the United States and other allies and said economic security cooperation with Washington could bolster the country's crisis management capabilities.翻译:尹强调了他与美国和其他盟国维持安全关系的首要任务，并表示与华盛顿的经济安全合作可以增强该国的危机管理能力。

He also pledged South Korea would maintain mutually beneficial cooperation with China, South Korea's largest trading partner.翻译:他还承诺韩国将与韩国最大贸易伙伴中国保持互利合作。

($1 = 1,348.7800 won)翻译:(1 美元 = 1,348.7800 韩元)

Reporting by Jihoon Lee and Ju-min Park Editing by Ed Davies翻译:Jihoon Lee 和 Ju-min Park 报道 Ed Davies 编辑

item.title: 越南考虑建设第一座半导体工厂，美国官员警告成本过高
item.description:
Summary:
  • Hanoi is preparing incentive plans for chips companies翻译:河内正在为芯片公司制定激励计划
  • Vietnam has said it wants its first fab this decade翻译:越南表示希望在十年内建立第一座晶圆厂
  • Talks with GlobalFoundries, PSMC at preliminary stage翻译:与 GlobalFoundries、PSMC 进行初步谈判

Vietnam is holding talks with chips companies with the aim of boosting investment in the country and possibly building its first chipmaking plant, or fab, two business executives said, despite warnings from U.S. industry officials about high costs.翻译:两位企业高管表示，尽管美国行业官员就高成本发出警告，但越南正在与芯片公司进行谈判，目的是增加在该国的投资，并可能建设其第一家芯片制造厂或晶圆厂。

The Southeast Asian electronics manufacturing hub already hosts U.S. giant Intel's (INTC.O) largest semiconductor packaging and testing plant worldwide and is home to several chip designing software firms. It is working on a strategy to attract more semiconductor investment, including from foundries, which focus on manufacturing chips.翻译:这个东南亚电子制造中心已经拥有美国巨头英特尔(INTC.O)全球最大的半导体封装和测试工厂，并且是多家芯片设计软件公司的所在地。该公司正在制定一项战略，以吸引更多半导体投资，包括来自专注于制造芯片的代工厂的投资。

Meetings with half a dozen U.S. chip firms took place in recent weeks, including with fab operators, Vu Tu Thanh, head of the Vietnam office of the US-ASEAN Business Council, told Reuters. He declined to identify the firms because talks were still at a preliminary stage.翻译:美国-东盟商业理事会越南办事处负责人 Vu Tu Thanh 告诉路透社，最近几周与六家美国芯片公司举行了会议，其中包括与晶圆厂运营商的会议。他拒绝透露具体公司名称，因为谈判仍处于初步阶段。

A chip executive, who declined to be identified because he was not allowed to talk to media, said talks with potential investors have involved U.S. contract manufacturer GlobalFoundries (GFS.O) and Taiwan's PSMC.翻译:一位因不被允许接受媒体采访而拒绝透露姓名的芯片高管表示，与潜在投资者的谈判涉及美国合约制造商 GlobalFoundries (GFS.O)和台湾 PSMC。

The aim was to build Vietnam's first fab, most likely for less advanced chips used in cars or for telecoms applications, the executive added.翻译:这位高管补充说，其目标是建造越南第一座晶圆厂，最有可能用于汽车或电信应用中使用的不太先进的芯片。

The meetings followed an historic upgrade of formal ties between Vietnam and the U.S. in September, when President Joe Biden visited Hanoi and the White House described the former foe as potentially a "critical player" in semiconductor global supply chains.翻译:九月份，越南和美国之间的正式关系实现了历史性的升级，当时美国总统乔·拜登访问了河内，白宫将这个前敌人描述为半导体全球供应链中潜在的“关键参与者”。

GlobalFoundries attended a restricted business summit during Biden's visit after an invitation from the president himself, the company said, but has since shown no immediate interest in investing in Vietnam, a person familiar with the matter said.翻译:一位知情人士称，格罗方德表示，应总统本人的邀请，在拜登访问期间参加了一场受限制的商业峰会，但此后并未表现出立即投资越南的兴趣。

"We do not comment on market rumors," a GlobalFoundries spokesperson said when asked about subsequent contacts. PSMC did not reply to a request for comment.翻译:当被问及后续接触时，GlobalFoundries 发言人表示：“我们不对市场传言发表评论。” PSMC 没有回复置评请求。

Industry officials said meetings at this stage were mostly to test interest and discuss potential incentives and subsidies, including on power supplies, infrastructure and the availability of trained workforce.翻译:行业官员表示，现阶段的会议主要是为了测试兴趣并讨论潜在的激励措施和补贴，包括电力供应、基础设施和训练有素的劳动力的可用性。

The Vietnamese government has said it wants its first fab by the end of this decade and on Monday said chip companies would benefit from "the highest incentives available in Vietnam".翻译:越南政府表示，希望在本十年末建成第一家晶圆厂，并于周一表示，芯片公司将受益于“越南可获得的最高激励措施”。

It may also support local firms such as state-owned tech company Viettel (CTR.HM) to build fabs with imported equipment, Hung Nguyen, senior program manager on supply chains at Hanoi's University Vietnam, told Reuters.翻译:越南河内大学供应链高级项目经理 Hung Nguyen 告诉路透社，它还可能支持国有科技公司 Viettel (CTR.HM)等当地企业使用进口设备建造晶圆厂。

Viettel did not reply to a request for comment.翻译:Viettel 没有回复置评请求。

$50 BILLION BET

However, Robert Li, Vice President of U.S. Synopsys (SNPS.O), a leading chip design firm with operations in Vietnam, urged the government to "think twice" before doling out subsidies to build fabs.翻译:然而，在越南开展业务的领先芯片设计公司美国新思科技(SNPS.O)副总裁罗伯特·李 (Robert Li) 敦促政府在发放补贴建设晶圆厂之前“三思而后行”。

Speaking at "Vietnam Semiconductor Summit" in Hanoi on Sunday, he said building a foundry could cost as much as $50 billion, and would entail competing on subsidies with China, the U.S., South Korea and the European Union which have announced spending plans on chips between $50 and $150 billion each.翻译:他周日在河内举行的“越南半导体峰会”上发表讲话时表示，建设一家代工厂可能耗资高达 500 亿美元，并且需要与中国、美国、韩国和欧盟进行补贴竞争，这些国家都已宣布了芯片支出计划每项在 50 至 1500 亿美元之间。

John Neuffer, President of the U.S. Semiconductor Industry Association, at the same conference recommended the government focus on chip sectors where Vietnam was already strong, such as assembling, packaging and testing.翻译:美国半导体行业协会主席约翰·诺伊弗(John Neuffer)在同一次会议上建议政府重点关注越南已经实力雄厚的芯片行业，例如组装、封装和测试。

Reporting by Francesco Guarascio @fraguarascio; additional reporting by Khanh Vu in Hanoi and Fanny Potkin in Singapore; Editing by Lincoln Feast.翻译:Francesco Guarascio@fraguarascio 报道； Khanh Vu 在河内和 Fanny Potkin 在新加坡的补充报道；林肯·盛宴编辑。

item.title: 中国将于周四火化“杰出”领导人李克强
item.description:
China will cremate the remains of former Premier Li Keqiang on Thursday, when flags will fly at half mast across the country in mourning for an "outstanding" leader, the official Xinhua news agency reported.翻译:据官方新华社报道，中国将于周四火化前总理李克强的遗体，届时全国降半旗哀悼这位“杰出”领导人。

Li, a former economist and pro-reform leader who served as the premier for 10 years before retiring in March, died of a heart attack on Friday.翻译:李克强是一位前经济学家和支持改革的领导人，曾担任总理十年，于今年三月退休，他于周五因心脏病去世。

His remains were transferred to Beijing from Shanghai aboard a special flight on that day, Xinhua reported.翻译:据新华社报道，他的遗体当天乘坐专机从上海运抵北京。

"He was extolled as an excellent CPC member, a time-tested and loyal communist soldier and an outstanding proletarian revolutionist, statesman and leader of the Party and the state," Xinhua said on Tuesday, referring to the Chinese Communist Party.翻译:新华社周二在谈到中国​​共产党时说：“他是一名优秀的中国共产党员，是一位久经考验的忠诚的共产主义战士，是一位杰出的无产阶级革命家、政治家、党和国家的领导人。”

On the day of the cremation, national flags will fly at half-mast to mourn Li at the capital's Tiananmen Square, the Great Hall of the People, the foreign ministry as well as seats of local governments across the country, and diplomatic missions, Xinhua said.翻译:火葬当天，首都天安门广场、人民大会堂、外交部以及全国各地地方政府、使馆等场所下半旗哀悼。说。

Li's death was a huge loss to the Communist Party and the nation, according to an official obituary posted by Xinhua last week.翻译:新华社上周发布的官方讣告称，李的逝世是共产党和国家的巨大损失。

But Li, once viewed as a Communist Party leadership contender, was sidelined in recent years, analysts and diplomats said, as President Xi Jinping tightened his grip on economic policymaking.翻译:但分析人士和外交官表示，随着国家主席习近平加强对经济决策的控制，曾被视为共产党领导层竞争者的李克强近年来被边缘化。

Reporting by Ryan Woo and Ethan Wang; Editing by Robert Birsel翻译:Ryan Woo 和 Ethan Wang 的报道；罗伯特·伯塞尔编辑
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 随着能见度下降，中国雾霾笼罩的北方进入最高污染警报
item.description:
Authorities issued their highest warnings for fog and haze on Tuesday as smog enveloped major cities in northern China, warning the public that visibility could drop to less than 50 metres (164 feet).翻译:周二，随着烟雾笼罩中国北方的主要城市，当局发布了雾霾的最高警报，警告公众能见度可能降至不到 50 米（164 英尺）。

Northern province Hebei launched an anti-pollution emergency response, listing traffic safety controls for when necessary including suspending flight takeoffs and landings, temporarily closing highways and suspending ferries, China's meteorological bureau said in a notice.翻译:中国气象局在一份通知中表示，河北省启动了污染防治应急响应，列出了必要时的交通安全控制措施，包括暂停航班起降、暂时关闭高速公路、暂停轮渡等。

Authorities also warned road users to stop in safe parking areas when conditions required and asked people to stay indoors.翻译:当局还警告道路使用者在有需要时将车停在安全停车区，并要求人们呆在室内。

Beijing said it would implement traffic control measures if the capital activates its highest air pollution warning.翻译:北京表示，如果首都启动空气污染最高预警，将实施交通管制措施。

Heavy smog has engulfed the country's north for a few days while autumn temperatures soared to typical early summer levels close to 30 degrees Celsius (86 degrees Fahrenheit) in some areas.翻译:严重的雾霾已经席卷了该国北部几天，而部分地区秋季气温飙升至典型的初夏水平，接近 30 摄氏度（86 华氏度）。

Experts said weak cold air currents from the north pole were a key factor behind the unusual weather.翻译:专家表示，来自北极的微弱冷气流是造成异常天气的关键因素。

As air pollution levels in the wider Beijing-Tianjin-Hebei area and northern part of Henan province reached moderate to severe, pollution control experts said increased industrial activities, heavy trucking and crop fires had contributed to the haze, state media CCTV reported.翻译:据官方媒体中央电视台报道，随着京津冀地区和河南省北部地区的空气污染水平达到中度至重度，污染控制专家表示，工业活动、重型卡车运输和农作物火灾的增加导致了雾霾。

Regional power consumption in late October was up 5% compared with first half of the month, more significantly in the cement, brick and tile industries, worsening conditions, CCTV said.翻译:据央视报道，10月下旬地区用电量较上半月增长5%，其中水泥、砖瓦行业增长更为明显，形势恶化。

Parts of Tianjin municipality and Hebei and Shandong provinces, as well as eastern areas of Jiangsu province saw heavy fog resulting in visibility of less than 1 km (0.62 mile) on Tuesday morning, the National Meteorological Center (NMC) said.翻译:国家气象中心（NMC）表示，周二上午，天津市部分地区、河北省、山东省以及江苏省东部地区出现大雾，能见度不足1公里（0.62英里）。

Until Thursday, light to moderate haze will continue to cover the central and southern parts of China's northern region, with severe haze forecast in the central parts, NMC said.翻译:国家气象局表示，至周四，我国北方地区中南部地区仍将有轻到中度灰霾天气，其中中部地区预计有重度灰霾天气。

Cold air currents are forecast to stream in the north from Thursday night, creating conditions that could weaken and dissipate the haze, the weather forecaster said.翻译:天气预报员表示，预计从周四晚上开始，冷气流将吹向北部，为削弱和消散雾霾创造条件。

Reporting by Liz Lee and Shanghai newsroom; Editing by Jamie Freed翻译:Liz Lee和上海新闻编辑室的报道；杰米·弗里德编辑

item.title: 中国在敏感地点发现外资气象观测点
item.description:
China has discovered illegal foreign government-funded meteorological detection sites around sensitive places including military compounds, its state security ministry said on Tuesday.翻译:中国国家安全部周二表示，中国在军事大院等敏感地点周围发现了由外国政府资助的非法气象探测点。

Some of these observation points were set up around military units and military industrial enterprises, while some were located in major grain-producing areas that analyse the growth of crops and grain yield, the ministry said.翻译:农业部表示，这些观测点有的设立在部队和军工企业周边，有的设在粮食主产区，分析农作物长势和粮食产量。

Some even transmit real-time information to official meteorological agencies overseas at high frequency and at multiple points, it added, calling the stations widely distributed in the country a "hidden risk to national security".翻译:报告补充说，有些气象站甚至高频次、多点向海外官方气象机构传输实时信息，称这些气象站分布在中国各地，是“国家安全的隐患”。

The ministry said Chinese national security agencies, together with the meteorological and confidentiality departments, have promptly blocked the country's meteorological data being exported after investigating.翻译:公安部表示，国家安全部门会同气象、保密部门调查后，及时阻止我国气象数据出口。

The authorities investigated more than 10 overseas meteorological equipment agents, inspected more than 3,000 foreign-related meteorological stations in its crackdown on such sites nationwide.翻译:当局在全国范围内查处涉外气象设备代理机构，查处了10多家境外气象设备代理商，检查了3000多个涉外气象站。

The involved foreign parties, which were unnamed, did not have administrative licence for their activities, had not submitted the meteorological data to Chinese meteorological authorities and transmitted the data overseas without approval, China said.翻译:中方称，涉案外国当事人未具名，其活动没有行政许可，未向中国气象部门报送气象数据，并未经批准将数据传输至境外。

Reporting by Liz Lee; Editing by Michael Perry翻译:丽兹·李报道；迈克尔·佩里编辑

item.title: 外交部长：中方希望欧盟在双边合作中采取务实、理性的态度
item.description:
China hopes that the European Union (EU) will adopt a more pragmatic and rational attitude in cooperation with China, its foreign minister Wang Yi said.翻译:王毅外长表示，中方希望欧盟在对华合作中采取更加务实、理性的态度。

Wang stressed that China and the EU are partners, and that "common interests far outweigh differences".翻译:王毅强调，中欧是伙伴，“共同利益远大于分歧”。

He also hopes the EU would avoid external interference, ensure mutual openness and promote the stable development of bilateral relations, according to a ministry statement late on Monday.翻译:根据周一晚间的一份外交部声明，他还希望欧盟避免外部干扰，确保相互开放，促进双边关系稳定发展。

His remarks come after a meeting with the foreign affairs adviser to France's president in Beijing on Monday.翻译:他是在周一与法国总统外交事务顾问在北京会面后发表上述言论的。

item.title: 早盘竞价：所有人都关注日本央行 1% 的收益率上限
item.description:
A look at the day ahead in Asian markets from Jamie McGeever, financial markets columnist.翻译:金融市场专栏作家杰米·麦克吉弗 (Jamie McGeever) 对亚洲市场未来一天的展望。

Asia's economic calendar is jammed with top-tier releases on Tuesday, from Chinese purchasing managers index data to third quarter GDP figures from Hong Kong and Taiwan, but one stands above all others - the Bank of Japan's policy meeting.翻译:周二，亚洲经济日历上挤满了顶级发布的数据，从中国采购经理人指数数据到香港和台湾第三季度GDP数据，但其中最重要的是日本央行的政策会议。

Will the BOJ spook markets on Halloween and the final trading day of the month by effectively tightening monetary policy further with another tweak to its 'yield curve control' policy?翻译:日本央行是否会在万圣节和本月最后一个交易日通过再次调整“收益率曲线控制”政策来进一步收紧货币政策，从而惊动市场？

It is a huge week for global markets and policy - the BOJ's decision on Tuesday is the first of three major central bank pronouncements, with the U.S. Federal Reserve coming on Wednesday and the Bank of England on Thursday.翻译:对于全球市场和政策来说，这是重要的一周——日本央行周二的决定是三大央行声明中的第一个， 美联储将于周三发布决定， 英国央行将于周四发布决定。

Speculation that the BOJ will act ramped up on Monday after Nikkei, citing sources close to the matter, reported that policymakers may further tweak YCC to allow the 10-year Japanese Government Bond yield to rise above 1%.翻译:周一，日经新闻援引知情人士的话称，政策制定者可能会进一步调整 YCC，以允许 10 年期日本政府债券收益率升至 1% 以上，此后，有关日本央行将采取行动的猜测升温。

The yen rallied strongly for a second straight session, the 10-year yield rose again to a fresh decade-high nudging 0.89%, and the benchmark Nikkei 225 stock index gave back all of Friday's gains and slid 1%.翻译:日元连续第二个交易日强劲上涨，10年期国债收益率再次升至十年新高0.89%，基准日经225股指回吐上周五的全部涨幅并下跌1%。

It is shaping up to be a year of two halves for Japanese stocks as the prospect of the BOJ abandoning its super-loose monetary policy becomes more likely. The Nikkei is down 3.6% this month, on track for its biggest monthly loss since December, and is down 8% so far in the second half of this year.翻译:随着日本央行放弃超宽松货币政策的可能性变得更大，日本股市将迎来两半的一年。日经指数本月下跌 3.6%，有望创下 12 月以来最大单月跌幅，今年下半年迄今已下跌 8%。

But it is still up 17% year-to-date thanks to a stunning 27% rally in the January-June period that saw it scale a 33-year high close to 34,000 points, as many investors bet that Japan Inc was back after years - decades - in the doldrums.翻译:但今年迄今仍上涨了 17%，这要归功于 1 月至 6 月期间惊人的 27% 上涨，创下 33 年来的高点，接近 34,000 点，因为许多投资者押注日本公司在多年后卷土重来。 - 数十年 - 低迷。

Negative interest rates, the BOJ accumulating 45% of all outstanding Japanese Government Bonds, and a 30% slide in the yen's value against the dollar since early 2021 made Japanese stocks extremely attractive.翻译:负利率、日本央行积累了所有未偿还日本政府债券的 45%，以及自 2021 年初以来日元兑美元汇率下跌 30%，使得日本股市极具吸引力。

By real effective exchange rate measures, the yen is its weakest in over 50 years, luring foreign buyers in to snap up assets on the relative cheap.翻译:按照实际有效汇率衡量，日元处于 50 多年来的最低水平，吸引外国买家以相对便宜的价格抢购资产。

The question now is, how much of that is firmly in the rear-view mirror? And how far and how powerfully might the elastic snap back if a paradigm shift is underway and domestic borrowing costs keep on rising?翻译:现在的问题是，其中有多少是牢牢地留在后视镜中的？如果范式转变正在进行并且国内借贷成本持续上升，弹性反弹的幅度和力度有多大？

Inflation in Japan has finally taken off, and for the first time in decades, appears to be sticking well above 2%.翻译:日本的通货膨胀终于开始腾飞，并且几十年来首次似乎远高于 2%。

Also on Tuesday, China's PMI figures are expected to show that manufacturing activity grew slightly again in October, at the same pace as the previous month, according to a Reuters poll forecast.翻译:同样在周二，根据路透调查预测，中国的 PMI 数据预计将显示 10 月份制造业活动再次小幅增长，​​增速与上月持平。

After a deeply disappointing first half of the year, Chinese economic data have started to come in above expectations in recent months. Will this trend continue into the start of the fourth quarter?翻译:在经历了令人深感失望的上半年之后，中国经济数据近几个月开始超出预期。这种趋势会持续到第四季度初吗？

Here are key developments that could provide more direction to markets on Tuesday:翻译:以下是可能为周二市场提供更多方向的关键进展：

- Bank of Japan policy decision翻译:- 日本央行政策决定

- China PMIs (October)翻译:- 中国采购经理人指数（10 月）

- Japan unemployment, industrial production, retail sales (September)翻译:- 日本失业率、工业生产、零售销售（九月）

By Jamie McGeever;翻译:作者：杰米·麦克吉弗；

item.title: 中国军方称菲律宾船只“非法进入”黄岩岛附近海域
item.description:
China's military said on Monday that a Philippine military ship "illegally entered" waters near Scarborough Shoal without authorisation and it urged the Philippines to immediately stop its provocations.翻译:中国军方周一表示，菲律宾军舰未经授权“非法进入”黄岩岛附近海域，敦促菲律宾立即停止挑衅行为。

The statement marks a rare warning from the Chinese military towards the Philippines over its moves in disputed waters in the South China Sea. The military had mostly directed its warnings against U.S. warships in the region.翻译:该声明标志着中国军方就菲律宾在南海争议海域的举动向菲律宾发出了罕见的警告。军方的警告主要针对该地区的美国军舰。

China and the Philippines have had several confrontations in the South China Sea, recently trading accusations about a collision between a Chinese coastguard vessel and a boat from the Philippines.翻译:中国和菲律宾在南海发生了多次对抗，最近就中国海警船与菲律宾船只相撞事件相互指责。

"We are urging the Philippine side to immediately stop its infringement and provocations, and earnestly avoid further escalation," said senior colonel Tian Junli, a spokesperson for the People's Liberation Army Southern Theater Command.翻译:解放军南部战区新闻发言人田军里大校表示，我们敦促菲方立即停止侵犯和挑衅行为，切实避免事态进一步升级。

The Scarborough Shoal is claimed by China, the Philippines and Taiwan.翻译:中国、菲律宾和台湾均声称对黄岩岛拥有主权。

"The Philippine side's actions have seriously violated China's sovereignty and international law and basic norms governing international relations, and are prone to misunderstanding and miscalculation," Tian said.翻译:田说：“菲方的做法严重违反中国主权，违反国际法和国际关系基本准则，很容易引起误解和误判。”

He said China followed, monitored, warned and blocked the ship in accordance with the law.翻译:他说，中方依法对该船进行跟踪、监视、警告、拦截。

Beijing claims sovereignty over almost the entire South China Sea, including parts of the exclusive economic zones of Brunei, Indonesia, Malaysia, the Philippines and Vietnam.翻译:北京声称对几乎整个南海拥有主权，其中包括文莱、印度尼西亚、马来西亚、菲律宾和越南的部分专属经济区。

This has caused escalating maritime friction and territorial disputes.翻译:这导致海上摩擦和领土争端不断升级。

Reporting by Ethan Wang and Bernard Orr; Editing by Alison Williams and Jonathan Oatis翻译:Ethan Wang 和 Bernard Orr 的报道；艾莉森·威廉姆斯和乔纳森·奥蒂斯编辑
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 习近平称中国女性必须开创“家庭新风尚”
item.description:
Chinese President Xi Jinping said women have a critical role and must establish a "new trend of family", as the nation grapples with an ageing population and record decline in the birth rate.翻译:中国国家主席习近平表示，在中国应对人口老龄化和出生率创纪录下降之际，女性发挥着关键作用，必须树立“家庭新风尚”。

Xi in comments, published on state news agency Xinhua on Monday, said the role of women had been part of a discussion with the new leadership team of the All China Women's Federation, which operates under the Communist Party.翻译:习近平在国家通讯社新华社周一发表的评论中表示，妇女的作用已成为与共产党领导下的中华全国妇女联合会新领导班子讨论的一部分。

Doing a good job in women's work is not only related to women's own development, he said but also related to "family harmony, social harmony, national development and national progress".翻译:做好妇女工作不仅关系到妇女自身发展，也关系到“家庭和谐、社会和谐、国家发展、民族进步”。

It is necessary to "actively cultivate a new culture of marriage and childbearing and strengthen guidance on young people's view on marriage, childbirth and family," he said.翻译:他说，要“积极培育婚育新文化，加强对青少年婚育家庭观的引导”。

Factors including high childcare costs, career hindrance, gender discrimination and not wanting to get married have deterred many young Chinese women from having children.翻译:高昂的育儿费用、职业障碍、性别歧视以及不想结婚等因素阻碍了许多中国年轻女性生孩子。

The number of births is closely tied to marriage rates because official policies make it hard for single women to have children.翻译:出生人数与结婚率密切相关，因为官方政策使单身女性很难生育。

China's National Bureau of Statistics in January reported the first population drop in six decades and the country's population is rapidly ageing.翻译:中国国家统计局一月份报告称， 人口出现六十年来的首次下降，而且中国人口正在迅速老龄化。

In the last two years, authorities across China have unveiled measures to lift the country's birth rate including financial incentives and boosting childcare facilities.翻译:过去两年，中国各地当局出台了提高出生率的措施，包括财政激励措施和加强托儿设施。

The state media has often linked population development to the strength and "rejuvenation" of the country.翻译:官方媒体经常将人口发展与国家的实力和“复兴”联系起来。

Reporting by Farah Master and the Beijing newsroom; editing by Barbara Lewis翻译:法拉·马斯特和北京新闻编辑室的报道；芭芭拉·刘易斯编辑

item.title: 俄罗斯的弱势削弱了西伯利亚力量2号与中国天然气连接的理由
item.description:
Summary:
  • Russia is bolstering ties with East翻译:俄罗斯正在加强与东方的关系
  • Power of Siberia-2 to supply 50 bcm of gas per year翻译:Siberia-2 每年供应 50 bcm 天然气
  • Talks on the link have been protracted翻译:关于该链接的谈判已旷日持久
  • Russia competes with Turkmenistan, LNG suppliers翻译:俄罗斯与土库曼斯坦液化天然气供应商竞争

Russia is counting on a planned new pipeline to China as it seeks to make up for lost gas sales in Europe, but industry insiders see major risks around the project and question whether it will justify the huge costs.翻译:俄罗斯正指望计划修建一条通往中国的新管道，以弥补欧洲天然气销售的损失，但业内人士认为该项目存在重大风险，并质疑其巨额成本是否合理。

Russia has been in talks for years about building the Power of Siberia-2 to carry 50 billion cubic metres of natural gas a year from the Yamal region in northern Russia to China via Mongolia - almost as much as the now idle Nord Stream 1 pipeline under the Baltic Sea that was damaged by explosions last year.翻译:俄罗斯多年来一直在讨论建设西伯利亚力量2号管道，每年从俄罗斯北部的亚马尔地区经蒙古向中国输送500亿立方米天然气——几乎与目前闲置的北溪1号管道一样多。去年因爆炸而受损的波罗的海。

The plan has gained urgency as Moscow aims to double its gas exports to energy-hungry China to make up for the collapse of its exports to Europe following the war in Ukraine. But agreement on key issues including pricing remains elusive.翻译:由于莫斯科计划将其对能源匮乏的中国的天然气出口增加一倍，以弥补乌克兰战争后对欧洲出口的崩溃，因此该计划变得更加紧迫。但在包括定价在内的关键问题上仍难以达成一致。

China's President Xi Jinping told Russian President Vladimir Putin in Beijing this month that he hoped the China-Mongolia-Russia gas pipeline will make substantive progress as soon as possible, yet nothing has been formally agreed between the two countries.翻译:中国国家主席习近平本月在北京对俄罗斯总统普京表示，希望中蒙俄天然气管道尽快取得实质性进展，但两国之间尚未达成任何正式协议。

Russia currently exports gas to China through the Power of Siberia 1 pipeline, which began operating in 2019 and runs through eastern Siberia into China's northeastern Heilongjiang province.翻译:俄罗斯目前通过西伯利亚力量1号管道向中国出口天然气，该管道于2019年开始运营，穿过东西伯利亚进入中国东北部的黑龙江省。

Experts say that as China is not expected to need additional gas supply until after 2030 Beijing could drive a hard bargain on price for a second pipeline via Siberia.翻译:专家表示，预计中国在2030 年之后才需要额外的天然气供应，北京方面可能会就途经西伯利亚的第二条管道的价格进行艰难的讨价还价。

Moscow has not said how much the 2,600 km (1,616 miles) Power of Siberia-2 would cost or how it would be financed. Some analysts have put the cost at up to $13.6 billion.翻译:莫斯科尚未透露全长 2,600 公里（1,616 英里）的西伯利亚力量 2 号工程的成本或融资方式。一些分析师估计成本高达 136 亿美元。

"There are too many risks, not least political ones. It's too dangerous to depend on a single buyer which may change its decision to buy the product from you any time," said a Russian industry source familiar with the talks.翻译:“风险太多，尤其是政治风险。依赖单一买家太危险了，因为他可能随时改变从你那里购买产品的决定，”一位熟悉谈判的俄罗斯行业消息人士表示。

Russia aims to increase supplies via Power of Siberia 1 to 38 bcm annually by 2025.翻译:俄罗斯的目标是到 2025 年通过西伯利亚力量每年将供应量增加 1 至 38 bcm。

If the plans for Power of Siberia 2 and another link from Russia's far eastern island of Sakhalin come to fruition, Russia's pipeline gas exports to China would rise to almost 100 bcm per year by 2030.翻译:如果西伯利亚力量2号和俄罗斯远东萨哈林岛的另一条线路的计划能够实现，到2030年，俄罗斯对中国的管道天然气出口量将增至每年近100立方厘米。

That's around half of Russia's annual exports to Europe at the peak reached in 2018 and compared to a combined capacity of 110 bcm of Nord Stream 1 and 2.翻译:这大约是俄罗斯在 2018 年达到峰值时对欧洲的年出口量的一半，而北溪 1 号和 2 号的总容量为 110 bcm。

Russia, however, expects the price of its pipeline gas for China to steadily decline over the next few years, according to a government document, and be much lower than prices for sales to Europe - which before the war in Ukraine accounted for 80% of Russian gas exports.翻译:然而，根据一份政府文件，俄罗斯预计其输往中国的管道天然气价格将在未来几年稳步下降，并远低于输往欧洲的价格——在乌克兰战争之前，欧洲输往欧洲的价格占俄罗斯出口天然气总量的80%。俄罗斯天然气出口。

The Russian economy ministry has not responded to a request for comment on the document published last month.翻译:俄罗斯经济部尚未回应对上个月发布的文件发表评论的请求。

The document sees the price of Russian pipeline gas for Turkey and Europe falling to an average $501.60 per 1,000 cubic metres this year and to $481.70 in 2024 from $983.80 in 2022.翻译:该文件预计，今年俄罗斯输往土耳其和欧洲的管道天然气平均价格将从 2022 年的 983.80 美元降至每 1000 立方米 501.60 美元，并于 2024 年降至 481.70 美元。

For China, it expects the price to average $297.30 in 2023 and $271.60 in 2024.翻译:对于中国来说，预计 2023 年平均价格为 297.30 美元，2024 年平均价格为 271.60 美元。

DEPENDENT ON ONE BUYER

Russia said in March that state gas giant Gazprom (GAZP.MM), which will operate Power of Siberia-2, was finalising contract terms with China's top oil and gas major CNPC.翻译:俄罗斯3月份表示，将运营西伯利亚力量2号项目的国有天然气巨头俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司(Gazprom)正在与中国最大的石油和天然气巨头中石油敲定合同条款。

Gazprom began a feasibility study on the project in 2020 and has said it aims to start delivering gas by 2030. It did not reply to a request for comment on the cost of the project.翻译:俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司于 2020 年开始对该项目进行可行性研究，并表示目标是到 2030 年开始供应天然气。该公司没有回复对该项目成本的置评请求。

Dmitry Kondratov from the Economics Institute at the Russian Academy of Science, said the project is also undermined by extra costs related to the need to transport gas across China to end-users once the gas reaches China.翻译:俄罗斯科学院经济研究所的德米特里·康德拉托夫表示，一旦天然气到达中国，需要将天然气穿越中国运送给最终用户，因此产生额外成本，从而影响了该项目。

"Transportation costs for the Chinese side... will be approximately $270 per 1,000 cubic metres, therefore, if the Russian side does not provide price discounts, then the prospects for the construction of this gas pipeline until 2030 remain quite pessimistic," he wrote in a note this month.翻译:他写道：“中方的运输成本……约为每1000立方米270美元，因此，如果俄方不提供价格折扣，那么到2030年这条天然气管道的建设前景仍然相当悲观。”在本月的一份笔记中。

"This fact will require CNPC to build on its own all the necessary gas transportation infrastructure in China," Kondratov wrote.翻译:康德拉托夫写道：“这一事实要求中石油在中国自行建设所有必要的天然气运输基础设施。”

Sergey Vakulenko, non-resident fellow at the Carnegie Endowment for International Peace, said the project might "leave Gazprom in the red after transportation costs".翻译:卡内基国际和平基金会非常驻研究员谢尔盖·瓦库连科表示，该项目可能“导致俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司在扣除运输成本后出现亏损”。

"It will also make Gazprom dangerously dependent on one buyer, which will be able to not only dictate the terms of the contract, but also demand changes to those terms in future," Vakulenko, who has experience of working for Gazprom companies, wrote in a note in June.翻译:拥有在俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司工作经验的瓦库连科在《俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司》中写道：“这也将使俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司危险地依赖于一个买家，该买家不仅能够决定合同条款，而且还可以要求未来修改这些条款。”六月的一张笔记。

Russian Deputy Prime Minister Viktoria Abramchenko was quoted as saying this month that construction on the Soyuz Vostok gas pipeline, the Mongolian portion of Power of Siberia-2, could start in the first half of next year.翻译:俄罗斯副总理维多利亚·阿布拉姆琴科本月表示，联盟东方天然气管道（西伯利亚力量2号的蒙古部分）的建设可能于明年上半年开始。

In February 2022, Beijing also agreed to buy gas from Russia's Sakhalin island, to be transported via a new pipeline across the Japan Sea to China's Heilongjiang province, reaching up to 10 bcm a year later this decade.翻译:2022年2月，北京还同意从俄罗斯萨哈林岛购买天然气，通过一条横跨日本海的新管道输送到中国黑龙江省，本十年后每年输送量将达到10 bcm。

But Russia is also jostling with other competitors to sell gas to China, including Turkmenistan and providers of sea-borne liquefied natural gas from the United States, Qatar and Australia - further strengthening Beijing's bargaining power.翻译:但俄罗斯也在与其他竞争对手争夺向中国出售天然气，包括土库曼斯坦以及来自美国、卡塔尔和澳大利亚的海上液化天然气供应商，这进一步增强了北京的议价能力。

Additional reporting by Andrew Hayley in Beijing, Chen Aizhu in Singapore and Oksana Kobzeva in Moscow; Editing by Mark Trevelyan and Susan Fenton翻译:安德鲁·海利 (Andrew Hayley) 北京、陈爱珠 (Chen Aizhu) 新加坡和奥克萨娜·科布泽娃 (Oksana Kobzeva) 莫斯科的补充报道；马克·特里维廉和苏珊·芬顿编辑

item.title: 何立峰：中国经济沙皇出任党委主任
item.description:
China's economy tsar He Lifeng has been appointed director of a key ruling Communist Party economic body, matching his high-profile predecessor Liu He with a particularly powerful portfolio covering economic policy, the financial sector and trade ties with Washington.翻译:中国经济沙皇何立峰已被任命为执政的共产党一个重要经济机构的主任，与他备受瞩目的前任刘鹤一样，他在经济政策、金融部门以及与华盛顿的贸易关系方面拥有特别强大的权力。

He, who had previously headed the state planning agency, became one of China's four vice premiers in March when he replaced Liu He, who retired.翻译:曾任国家计划局局长的他今年三月接替退休的刘鹤，成为中国四位副总理之一。

He has now also replaced Liu as director of the office of the Central Finance and Economic Affairs Commission, a party body headed by President Xi Jinping.翻译:他现在还接替刘鹤担任中央财经委员会办公室主任，该委员会是由国家主席习近平领导的党内机构。

State media for the first time referred to He by his latest title in a readout of his meeting with a visiting French official on Sunday.翻译:官方媒体在周日宣读贺建奎与来访的法国官员会面的报道时，首次提及贺建奎的最新头衔。

Though regarded as a confidant of President Xi, He's ascent has surprised some analysts, who had expected Premier Li Qiang, former Shanghai party secretary, to take a bigger role in economic affairs.翻译:尽管被视为习近平主席的心腹，但贺建奎的崛起让一些分析人士感到惊讶，他们原本预计前上海市委书记、总理李强将在经济事务中发挥更大作用。

Since taking over the economic portfolio, He has met with U.S. Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen and EU Trade Commissioner Valdis Dombrovskis, and last week accompanied Xi on his first known visit to China's central bank.翻译:自接手经济事务以来，贺建奎会见了美国财政部长珍妮特·耶伦和欧盟贸易委员瓦尔迪斯·东布罗夫斯基斯，并于上周陪同习近平首次访问中国央行。

"He Lifeng is in the post to execute Xi's ideas but not to question him, as Liu He could," said an advisor who had sometimes sat in on briefings with both He and Liu, and spoke on condition of anonymity.翻译:“何立峰的职责是执行习近平的想法，但不会像刘鹤那样质疑他，”一位有时旁听何立峰和刘鹤的简报、不愿透露姓名的顾问表示。

The advisor also confirmed He does not speak English, unlike Liu, who studied economics at Harvard and was popular among U.S. officials because they could more easily converse with him.翻译:该顾问还证实，与刘不同，他不会说英语。刘在哈佛大学学习经济学，在美国官员中很受欢迎，因为他们可以更轻松地与他交谈。

Analysts also expect He will be named head of a new and even higher ranking party economic watchdog, once Xi revives the Central Financial Work Commission, which was was disbanded in 2003, having been set up in 1998 to build a role for the party within the central bank and financial regulators.翻译:分析人士还预计，一旦习近平重振中央金融工作委员会，贺建奎将被任命为一个新的、级别更高的党内经济监察机构的负责人。该委员会于 1998 年成立，旨在为党在经济领域发挥作用，该委员会于 2003 年被解散。中央银行和金融监管机构。

The world's second-largest economy grew faster than expected in the third quarter, though it is suffering from a domestic property crisis, high youth unemployment, depressed private sector confidence, and a slowdown in global growth.翻译:全球第二大经济体第三季度的增长快于预期，尽管它正遭受国内房地产危机、青年失业率高、私营部门信心低迷以及全球增长放缓的影响。

Policymakers have unveiled a raft of measures in recent weeks, but their ability to spur growth is constrained by fears over debt risks and a fragile yuan.翻译:政策制定者近几周公布了一系列措施，但刺激经济增长的能力受到债务风险和人民币脆弱的担忧的限制。

He could emerge as head of the resurrected Central Financial Work Commission, when state leaders, regulators and top bankers gather for a quinquennial, closed-door national financial work conference.翻译:当国家领导人、监管机构和顶级银行家齐聚召开五年一次的闭门全国金融工作会议时，他可能会成为复活后的中央金融工作委员会主席。

That meeting, which could set medium-term priorities for the broad financial industry, will take place in Beijing this week, Bloomberg News reported.翻译:据彭博社报道，该会议将于本周在北京举行，该会议可能会为整个金融业确定中期优先事项。
